summary: This document is an email from Jes Staley to an individual with the email address jeevacation@gmail.com, indicating that Staley will be in Miami on March 1st and suggesting a dinner meeting. The email is marked as confidential and is associated with JPMorgan Chase.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the sender of the email, reaching out to arrange a dinner meeting.

events.title: Dinner Meeting Proposal
events.description: Jes Staley proposes a dinner meeting while he is in Miami.

keyFacts: Jes Staley sent an email suggesting a dinner meeting in Miami.
The recipient's email address is jeevacation@gmail.com.
The email indicates Staley will be in Miami on March 1, 2010.
The document is marked as confidential and associated with JPMorgan Chase.
